ovdesc.p: This is the table where the tenant contact details can be maintained and same can be used in MT.TENANT table.

desc.p: Unique reference to identify each tenant contact.
Specifies the description of tenant contact.
Specifies the name of the contact point
This field will contain mobile number of the tenant contact
This field can contain land line number of the tenant contact point
This field can contain official Email address of the tenant contact point
This field can contain the type of contact to define other contacts of the tenant.
The fields CONTACT.TYPE and CONTACT.DETAILS are associated multi value fields
Cannot be blank if CONTACT.DETAILS is populated.
This field can contain other user definable contact details.
The fields CONTACT.TYPE and CONTACT.DETAILS are associated multivalue fields
Cannot be blank if CONTACT.TYPE is populated.
